allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: CanopyAI Survey Application

Flask-based survey app for Credit Union stakeholders to rank
pre-generated questions about AI interactions.

Features:
- 30 pre-seeded questions \(Marketing, Loans, Live Transactions\)
- Email-based authentication \(prevents duplicate votes\)
- Upvote/downvote with AJAX
- User question suggestions
- Results dashboard with CSV export
- CanopyAI branding

Related: CUInterface/Vyrdia_Financial_AI#84
EOF
\)")
